debs15.dkg_storm.builder

Class Instance

  • java.lang.Object
    • debs15.dkg_storm.builder.Instance

  • public class Instance
extends Object
    Author:
    Nicolo Rivetti This class represents the available operator instances to which the scheduler has to map partitions of the key space.
